short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide your IP, block ads and override HTML5 Geolocation using Torguard Premium 10GB Proxy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TorGuard New Premium Proxy browser extension uses high speed 10 Gigabit secure SSL proxies to keeps your web traffic private. Just like a VPN, it hides your IP address and encrypts all traffic passing through the web browser. Install this extension in a few clicks, choose your proxy location and connect. Once activated, websites will only see the proxy IP address, not your true location or IP. 

*This extension requires a TorGuard Premium Proxy Service Plan.*

TorGuard Premium Proxy Features:

- 17+ Countries to choose from
- Fast 10 Gigabit Servers
- Block Trackers & Ads
- Encrypt your traffic
- Hide your IP address
- Unblock Websites
- Multiple port options
- No Logs Kept
- 24/7 Support
